sense.def:
Kadar za nekaj rečemo, da je
precious
, se nam tisto zdi veliko vredno, zato moramo z njim ravnati varčno.

seg.quote: They have lost precious working time.
The one resource more precious than any other was land.

sense.def:
Predmeti in snovi, ki so
precious
, so vredni veliko, ker so redki.

Izraz
precious
uporabljamo za stvari, ki so naša last in se nam zdijo pomembne in jih ne želimo izgubiti.

seg.quote: I imagine he treasures that letter as one of the precious mementoes of his Presidency.
I'm sick and tired of your precious brother-in-law.

sense.def:
Kdor je
precious
, se vede zelo prisiljeno in nenaravno.

seg.quote: He has a slightly precious prose style.

sense.def:
Precious little of something
pomeni izjemno malo nečesa.

seg.quote: There's precious little they can learn from us.
